metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15575 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, Redmine.pm lacks a checkfor whether the Repository module is enabled in a project's settings, whichmight allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive differences information orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15575` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.4.2-1
redmine-mysql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.4.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: redmine package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-1').
